companies.company_name: TAKE-TWO INTERACTIVE SOFTWARE, INC Common Stock

key_risks: Over-reliance on key franchises like GTA
Regulatory scrutiny over microtransactions and loot boxes
Competitive pressures from major industry players
Economic sensitivity tied to discretionary consumer spending
controversies: Workplace culture concerns at Rockstar Games, including crunch practices
Allegations of a toxic workplace environment
social_issues: Promoting diversity and inclusion within the workforce
governance_issues: Management of reputational risks related to workplace culture
